name: Files by Google Trash Database
summary: A TRASH_DATABASE file contains a list of files that a Files by Google user has moved to the app's Trash folder. It is a SQLite 3 database ( .SQLITE ) that is also located in the Trash folder. Files by Google uses the TRASH_DATABASE file to restore trashed files to their previous locations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: TRASH_DATABASE file open in Apple TextEdit
images.alt: TRASH_DATABASE file open in Apple TextEdit
